LanguageData.PauseOtherSettlements_Tooltip: If enabled, other settlements (non-current map and non-pocket maps) will be paused. Disabling this will allow all other settlements to simulate.
LanguageData.PauseNewSettlementsByDefault_Tooltip: If checked, any newly created settlement will automatically be set to 'paused'.
LanguageData.PauseNewAnomalyLayersByDefault_Label: Pause new pocket maps by default
LanguageData.PauseNewAnomalyLayersByDefault_Tooltip: If checked, newly discovered pocket maps will be paused by default.
LanguageData.PauseAnomalyLayersWhenAway_Tooltip: If checked, pocket maps will be automatically paused when you are not viewing their parent settlement.\n*This feature has a small potential performance impact.
LanguageData.PauseTab_SettlementTooltip: Check to pause simulation for this settlement.
LanguageData.PauseTab_CurrentSettlementEditableToolti: You can preset the pause state for this settlement. However, the currently viewed map will always be simulated regardless of this setting.
LanguageData.PauseTab_AnomalyLayerTooltip: Check to pause simulation for this pocket map.
